decks.notes: The deck focuses on utilizing small evasive creatures, such as Ornithopter and Changeling Outcast, to quickly deal damage to the opponent. Yuriko, the Tiger's Shadow and Ingenious Infiltrator provide additional damage and card advantage when dealing combat damage with ninjas. The deck also includes disruption spells like Daze and Force of Will to protect its creatures and disrupt opponents' strategies. The inclusion of Kaito, Bane of Nightmares and other utility lands like Underground Sea and Wasteland adds versatility to the deck's gameplay.

This UR Aggro deck focuses on quick and aggressive plays, utilizing efficient spells like Lightning Bolt and Daze to control the board and deal damage. The deck also includes card draw and deck manipulation spells like Brainstorm and Ponder to ensure consistency. Mishra's Bauble and Urza's Bauble provide additional card advantage and information. The deck aims to pressure the opponent early with powerful threats like Dragon's Rage Channeler and Murktide Regent, while also disrupting the opponent's game plan with counterspells like Force of Will. Using a combination of tempo and threat assessment, this deck aims to win the game quickly and decisively.

The deck focuses on quickly filling the graveyard with powerful creatures, such as Murktide Regent and Archon of Cruelty, using cards like Entomb and Reanimate. It also includes disruptive spells like Thoughtseize and Force of Will to protect the combo. The deck aims to take control of the game early with efficient card selection and disruption, then reanimate a game-winning threat to secure the victory. It emphasizes speed and efficiency to overwhelm opponents before they have a chance to react.

This combo-reanimator deck focuses on quickly filling the graveyard with powerful creatures like Archon of Cruelty and Atraxa, Grand Unifier using cards like Entomb and Reanimate. The deck utilizes counterspells like Force of Will and Daze to protect its combo pieces, while also disrupting the opponent's game plan with cards like Thoughtseize and Brazen Borrower. Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student helps filter through the deck for key cards, while Murktide Regent provides a strong threat on the battlefield. The deck also includes mana denial with cards like Wasteland to keep the opponent off balance.

This deck focuses on a fast, aggressive strategy that seeks to quickly control the tempo of the game and disrupt the opponent's plans. By utilizing low-cost creatures like Delver of Secrets and Dragon's Rage Channeler, along with efficient removal spells such as Lightning Bolt and Unholy Heat, the deck aims to apply constant pressure and maintain board presence. Additionally, cards like Daze and Force of Will provide protection against opposing threats, while cards like Brainstorm and Ponder allow for card selection and consistency in drawing key pieces.

The main focus of this Dragon Stompy deck is to aggressively play disruptive prison pieces like Magus of the Moon and Chalice of the Void to lock opponents out of casting spells. It also features powerful threats like Fury and Pyrogoyf to end the game quickly. The deck utilizes mana acceleration with cards like Chrome Mox and Simian Spirit Guide to quickly deploy its threats and disrupt the opponent's game plan. Additionally, cards like Urza's Saga and Ancient Tomb provide additional utility and mana sources to fuel the aggressive game plan.

This deck focuses on utilizing Mystic Forge to combo off with artifacts to generate mana and card advantage. By reusing artifacts with Mystic Forge and combining them with cards like Glaring Fleshraker and Kozilek's Command, the deck aims to create a powerful board state and win the game quickly. Cards like Urza's Saga, Karn, the Great Creator, and Planar Nexus provide additional utility and options to control the game and disrupt the opponent's strategy. The key strategy revolves around efficiently utilizing artifacts and Mystic Forge to overwhelm the opponent and secure victory.

The deck focuses on utilizing a combination of graveyard manipulation and powerful creatures to quickly overwhelm the opponent. The strategy involves using cards like Entomb and Reanimate to bring back creatures like Archon of Cruelty and Atraxa, Grand Unifier onto the battlefield at a fast pace. Support cards like Thoughtseize, Force of Will, and Daze help protect the combo pieces while disruption like Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student and Brazen Borrower provide additional control options. The deck aims to win the game through explosive plays and efficient use of resources.

This deck focuses on quickly filling up the graveyard with powerful creatures using cards like Entomb and Reanimate, then bringing them back into play for a quick win. The deck also includes disruptive elements like Thoughtseize and Force of Will to protect the combo. The strategy is to outpace the opponent by reanimating threatening creatures like Archon of Cruelty and Murktide Regent while controlling the board with cards like Brazen Borrower and Daze. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a powerful board presence early in the game.

This deck focuses on utilizing disruptive spells and efficient removal to control the tempo of the game, while also using powerful creatures like Murktide Regent and Nethergoyf to quickly close out the game. By combining aggression with control elements, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while deploying threats of its own to put pressure on them. The combination of counter spells, removal, card draw, and strong creatures allows for a versatile and adaptable gameplay style that can adapt to various matchups and strategies.

The main concept of this deck is to create a disruptive and aggressive strategy by combining the Death & Taxes archetype with the additional power of the companion Yorion, Sky Nomad. The deck aims to efficiently control the board with cards like Thalia, Guardian of Thraben and Skyclave Apparition while pressuring the opponent with creatures like Phelia, Exuberant Shepherd and Overlord of the Balemurk. The deck also includes powerful equipment like Kaldra Compleat and Phantom Blade to enhance its combat capabilities and finish off opponents quickly.

The main concept of this deck is to apply early pressure on the opponent by using aggressive creatures like Delver of Secrets and Dragon's Rage Channeler, while disrupting their game plan with counterspells like Force of Will and Wasteland. The deck aims to control the board with removal spells like Lightning Bolt and Unholy Heat, while also generating card advantage with cantrips like Ponder and Brainstorm. The mana base is optimized to support the deck's aggressive game plan with fetch lands like Scalding Tarn and Mishra's Bauble. This deck thrives on tempo and efficient use of resources to win the game quickly.

The main concept of this deck is to utilize aggressive creatures with the ability to disrupt your opponent's game plan, while also generating quick mana and taking advantage of creature synergies. By combining powerful creatures like Archon of Emeria and Magus of the Moon with fast mana sources like Ancient Tomb and Simian Spirit Guide, this deck aims to establish early board presence and control the game tempo. Additionally, cards like Seasoned Dungeoneer and Broadside Bombardiers provide card advantage and additional utility to ensure a strong, aggressive strategy.

This Grixis Control deck focuses on controlling the board with a mix of removal spells, counterspells, and hand disruption. It also utilizes powerful Planeswalkers like Tamiyo and Narset to gain card advantage and disrupt the opponent's strategy. With a diverse array of threats like Snapcaster Mage and Baleful Strix, the deck can adapt to different situations and outvalue opponents in the late game. By efficiently answering threats and maintaining card advantage, this deck aims to outlast opponents and grind out victories through careful resource management and strategic play.
